name: ES32Lab
keywords: es32lab, ESDeveloperBR, ESDeveloper, Eder Santini, ESP32, display, SD, SPIFFS, file, LDR, i2c 8574, H bridge, keyboard, PCF8574
description: Library provided by ESDeveloperBR to facilitate the development of programs that utilize the ES32Lab board. ATTENTION: This library depends on the TFT_eSPI_ES32Lab library.
